thread.title: Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez ranked 32nd in Premier League when it comes to strikers' work rate
thread.title_full: Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez ranked 32nd in Premier League when it comes to strikers' work rate

author: John Cross
title: Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez ranked 32nd in Premier League when it comes to strikers' work rate
text:
Sport Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez ranked 32nd in Premier League when it comes to strikers' work rate Sanchez is outrun by most other front men in the English top flight - and there is a surprise name top of the table Share Sanchez's work rate has been criticised in the past (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get   
These are the incredible stats that prove Alexis Sanchez is 32nd in the Premier League when it comes to strikers running. 
Even though Sanchez has scored 18 goals in 27 appearances this season, his work rate is just as revealing. 
Sanchez covers just 9.10km on average and that puts him way down the table of Premier League strikers. 
It has been a source of great frustration to Arsene Wenger this season that, despite Sanchez’s histrionics making it look as if he works hard, he actually covers less ground than you think. Sanchez has a great goalscoring record but his running lets him down (Photo: Stuart MacFarlane) Arsene Wenger has criticised Sanchez's work rate in the past (Photo: REUTERS) 
Arsenal boss Wenger has been publicly and privately critical of Sanchez’s work rate and contribution to the team. 
And now the stats reveal that Wenger might just have a point… 
Incredibly, Stoke’s Peter Crouch covers the most ground with 12.06km per 90 minutes which is nearly three kilometres more than Sanchez. Peter Crouch covers more ground on average than any other Premier League striker (Photo: Reuters) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
